title: Beer Quest
intro: You need a beer. Now. Fast. Go get it!

win.text: You successfully got a beer and came back home alive! One more happy day in your life

lose.text: Maybe you didn't really need a beer from the start... But it's too late now

cards.cta: You are sitting on the couch watching TV. Suddenly voice in your head tells you to go get a beer.

left_action.text: Yes my lord, I will obey!

right_action.text: Maybe that's not a bad idea

cards.cta: You start preparing to go out but the only pair of jeans that you have is still wet after the laundry.
The sun is shining bright. You are on the way to the liquor shop. There's a cat on the road in front of you.
You spotted some coins stick in a pile of poo in a bush.

right_action.text: No way I touch that poo!

cards.cta: There's a homeless person near the liquor shop. He asks if you could help him with some money.
The liquor shop only have cheap lager and craft IPA in stock.
You are going back home. The cat you saw on your way to the shop seems to be dancing on the sidewalk.

right_action.text: This can't be real... Ignore what you just saw
